list.abs: ③玻璃光泽（vitreous luster）：其反射能力相对较弱，犹如平板玻璃之表面。如：水晶、橄榄石、碧玺、红宝石等。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin vitreus (from vitrum 'glass') + -ous

entry.def: Vitreous means made of glass or resembling glass.

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to or constituting the vitreous humor of the eye;
2. relating to or resembling or derived from or containing glass;
3. (of ceramics) having the surface made shiny and nonporous by fusing a vitreous solution to it;

sentences.sentence: "hard vitreous china used for plumbing fixtures"
